```{r}

rm(list = "pa_gop_contribs")
```

```{r}
ACS <- load_variables(2020, "acs5")


#Median household income in the last 12 months
get_acs(geography = "place",
              variables = c(household_income_12mo = "B19013_001"),
              state = "MD",
              year = 2020) %>% 
  filter(NAME == "Hagerstown city, Maryland")

rm(list = "medincome_20", "medincome_19")

# median household income will have the numebr and the total household income will show the number of households.
```
